name: Beat Lover Strawberry Jammy: The Power of Song
name_original: Beat Lover Strawberry Jammy: The Power of Song
description:
Meet Jenny, an up-and-coming idol singer by daylight, musical superheroine by moonlight. Inspired by magical girl series such as Sailor Moon as well as rhythm games like DDR and Umjammer Lammy, this game will have you winning the love of your fans and saving the city in style! Expected playtime: about 10 minutes.

- TAP to the beat in two exciting music stages!
- READ tongue-in-cheek visual novel-style cutscenes!
- FEAST your eyes on a charmingly blocky art style!

Made as part of Major Jam 2: Love, with the restriction that every texture had to fit within a 128x128 image. We ended up so frugal with our pixels that we didn't even use half of them!

Controls: ASD keys, A for the left lane, S for the center lane, D for the right lane

SPRITE SHEET:  https://imgur.com/a/IVQmfeH
